findings.title: A Floating Pragma is Set
findings.description: The compiler version should be a fixed one to avoid undiscovered compiler bugs.

findings.title: SafeMath Override
findings.description: SafeMath is no longer needed starting Solidity v0.8+. The compiler now has built-in overflow checking.

findings.title: Multiple Version
findings.description: Presence of multiple compiler version across all contracts

findings.title: Deprecated Keywords
findings.description: Use of deprecated functions/operators such as block.blockhash() for blockhash(), msg.gas for gasleft(), throw for revert(), sha3() for keccak256(), callcode() for delegatecall(), suicide() for selfdestruct(), constant for view or var for actual type name should be avoided to prevent unintended errors with newer compiler versions

findings.title: Unused Contract
findings.description: Presence of an unused, unimported or uncalled contract

findings.title: Assembly Usage
findings.description: Use of EVM assembly is error-prone and should be avoided or double-checked for correctness

findings.title: Similar Variable Names
findings.description: Variables with similar names could be confused for each other and therefore should be avoided
